result.title: Sustainability scorecard including guidance for RECs
result.description: The deliverable provides a selfassessment tool for new and existing RECs The sustainability scorecard enables RECs to assess the environmental economic and social implications of their activity in relation to concerned shareholders and the members of the local community The development of the scorecard will take into account relevant corporate sustainability reporting initiatives like eg Common Good Balance Sheets which have been already applied in practice by community wind farms in Germany The scorecard will be accompanied by practical guidance addressing RECs on how to use the tool

result.title: Dissemination strategy
result.description: The DC strategy report will include athe visual identity logo the content and outline of the offline materials to be produced leaflets postcards rollups posters leaning on the existing visual materials from the wwwenergeewatcheu b the target audience segmentation and the channels and messages to be used c the specifications of a web platform to be used for the storage of the training and communication material Moodle d the online communication strategy and a way to monitor the indicators social media to use definition of the hashtags creation of web pages on partner websites overview of all partners database to investigate the dissemination potential e a crosspromotion strategy list other similar EU projects and national and EU networks who could help us reach out to a high number of local stakeholders f a sustainability strategy dissemination after the end of the project
